YPlaneÂ¶

class YPlane

Represents a plane perpendicular to the y-axis.

Public Functions

YPlane(const double y, const short int id = 0)

Constructor for a plane perpendicular to the y-axis.

Parameters
  • id -

    the surface id

  • y -

    the location of the plane along the y-axis

void setY(const double y)

Set the location of this yplane on the y-axis.

Parameters
  • y -

    the location of the yplane on the y-axis

double getY()

Returns the location of the yplane on the y-axis.

Return
the location of the yplane on the y-axis

double getXMin()

Returns the minimum x value of -INFINITY on this yplane.

Return
the minimum x value of -INFINITY

double getXMax()

Returns the maximum x value of INFINITY on this yplane.

Return
the maximum x value of INFINITY

double getYMin()

Returns the minimum y value on this yplane.

Return
the minimum y value

double getYMax()

Returns the maximum y value on this yplane.

Return
the maximum y value

std::string toString()

Converts this yplane’s attributes to a character array.

The character array returned conatins the type of plane (ie, YPLANE) and the A, B, and C coefficients in the quadratic surface equation and the location of the plane on the y-axis.

Return
a character array of this yplane’s attributes

void printString()

Prints a string representation of all of the yplane’s objects to the console.
